[See our ServerBear Benchmarks! ](http://serverbear.com/benchmark/2015/05/06/bYAU4XDFlMjPX4Qn)(tested with 2048MB Guaranteed RAM)
> UnixBench
> <br>UnixBench (w/ all processors)	2391.6
> <br>UnixBench (w/ one processor)	1035.1
> 
> IOPS
> 
> I/O Seek Test (No Cache)
> <br>ioping -RD
> <br>19656 iops, 76.8 mb/s
> <br>min/avg/max/mdev = 0.0/0.1/0.6/0.0 ms
> 
> I/O Reads - Sequential
> <br>ioping -RL
> <br>5354 iops, 1338.4 mb/s
> <br>min/avg/max/mdev = 0.2/0.2/1.7/0.0 ms
> 
> I/O Reads - Cached
> <br>ioping -RC
> <br>626977 iops, 2449.1 mb/s
> <br>min/avg/max/mdev = 0.0/0.0/0.0/0.0 ms
> 
> DD
> <br>dd if=/dev/zero of=sb-io-test bs=1M count=1k conv=fdatasync
> <br>1.38826 s, 773 MB/s
> <br>dd if=/dev/zero of=sb-io-test bs=64k count=16k conv=fdatasync
> <br>1.16905 s, 918 MB/s
> <br>dd if=/dev/zero of=sb-io-test bs=1M count=1k oflag=dsync
> <br>2.14123 s, 501 MB/s
> <br>dd if=/dev/zero of=sb-io-test bs=64k count=16k oflag=dsync
> <br>6.90629 s, 155 MB/s
> 
> FIO
> <br>Read IOPS	22709.0
> <br>Read Bandwidth	90.8 MB/second
> <br>Write IOPS	155982.0
> <br>Write Bandwidth	623.9 MB/second

Our systems are located in Buffalo NY, in the famous ColoCrossing facility. Future locations and providers are in the works.

We accept PayPal, any major credit card and bitcoin.

We would love to answer questions. Please ask away.
